label: A3B12C_cF128_226_c_i_b-001
title: High-Temperature Y(BH$_{4}$)$_{3}$ Structure
comments:
Y(BH$_{4}$)$_{3}$ his been observed in three phases (Frommen, 2010): \begin{itemize} \item A \href{current_web_home_dir/A3B12C_cP128_205_d_4d_c-001}{room temperature cubic phase}, stable up to 473K, \item A (metastable?) orthorhombic phase, found in the 473-520K range, whose structure has not been determined, and \item This \href{current_web_home_dir/A3B12C_cF128_226_c_i_b-001}{high temperature cubic phase}. \end{itemize} ~ \vspace{-.25in} 
 This sample used deuterium, and was prepared at 475K and 10MPa and then cooled to room temperature.
